scripts.postbuild: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - build/index.js > build/index.tmp && mv build/index.tmp build/index.js
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish-beta-patch: npm run build && npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish-latest: npm run build && npm version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version.split('-')[0]") && npm publish
scripts.publish-latest-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
